loan.question: can i prepay my loan without penalty
loan.answer: Yes, most loans allow prepayment, but some may have a small prepayment penalty. Please check your loan agreement.

loan.question: how do i check my credit score
loan.answer: You can check your credit score online through authorized credit bureaus by providing your PAN and personal details.

loan.question: what is the difference between secured and unsecured loans
loan.answer: Secured loans require collateral (like property), while unsecured loans do not but usually have higher interest rates.

loan.question: what happens if i miss an emi payment
loan.answer: Missing an EMI may lead to late fees and impact your credit score. Contact your lender immediately to discuss options.

loan.question: how long does loan approval usually take
loan.answer: Loan approval time varies but typically takes 1-7 business days depending on document verification and loan type.

education.question: how can i apply for a scholarship
education.answer: You can apply for scholarships through the official portal of your institution or government scholarship websites.

education.question: what are the types of scholarships available
education.answer: Common scholarships include merit-based, need-based, sports scholarships, and scholarships for minorities or special categories.

education.question: how to prepare for competitive exams
education.answer: Create a study plan, use standard guides, practice past papers, and consider coaching or online courses.

education.question: what documents are needed for college admission
education.answer: Typically, you'll need academic transcripts, ID proof, recommendation letters, and application forms.

education.question: how to choose the right course for me
education.answer: Consider your interests, career goals, job market trends, and seek advice from counselors or mentors.
